solution_line_template: First find the total number of cloves needed to repel the vampires: {num_vampires_to_repel} vampires * {cloves_per_repel_unit} cloves / {vampires_per_repel_unit} vampires = <<{num_vampires_to_repel}*{cloves_per_repel_unit}/{vampires_per_repel_unit}={cloves_for_vampires}>>{cloves_for_vampires} cloves

Then find the total number of cloves needed to repel the wights: {num_wights_to_repel} wights * {cloves_per_repel_unit} cloves / {wights_per_repel_unit} wights = <<{num_wights_to_repel}*{cloves_per_repel_unit}/{wights_per_repel_unit}={cloves_for_wights}>>{cloves_for_wights} cloves

Then find the total number of cloves needed to repel the vampire bats: {num_bats_to_repel} vampire bats * {cloves_per_repel_unit} cloves / {bats_per_repel_unit} vampire bats = <<{num_bats_to_repel}*{cloves_per_repel_unit}/{bats_per_repel_unit}={cloves_for_bats}>>{cloves_for_bats} cloves

Then add up these three amounts to find the total number of cloves needed: {cloves_for_vampires} cloves + {cloves_for_wights} cloves + {cloves_for_bats} cloves = <<{cloves_for_vampires}+{cloves_for_wights}+{cloves_for_bats}={total_cloves}>>{total_cloves} cloves
